description: This file defines the GroupsScreen widget for the Fleet Management system, implementing a Flutter UI screen with CRUD operations for managing group entities. It includes UI components such as list views, dialogs, and interaction handlers, and it interacts with a GroupsProvider for data management.

classes.name: GroupsScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a list of groups with options to add, edit, or delete groups.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the widget state and triggers loading of groups after the first frame.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the GroupsScreen, including app bar, content body, and floating action button.

methods.name: _buildGroupCard
methods.description: Creates a Card widget representing a single BusinessGroup, with options to edit or delete.

methods.name: _showGroupEditor
methods.description: Displays the GroupEditorSheet modal for creating or editing a group.

methods.name: _confirmDelete
methods.description: Shows a confirmation dialog before deleting a group.
